title: Induced emf - rectangular loop entering field

content.question: A loop of conducting wire with length <math alttext="2 l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn><mo>ℓ</mo></math> and height <math alttext="l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo>ℓ</mo></math> moves at a speed of <math alttext="v equals, the fraction with numerator 3 l, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>ℓ</mo></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>. At time <math alttext="t sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> the loop enters a magnetic field of strength <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math>. Which of the following expressions correctly represents the magnitude of the <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mtext>emf</mtext></math> induced in the loop as the loop enters the magnetic field?

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 B l, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>B</mi><mo>ℓ</mo></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 2 B l squared, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>B</mi><msup><mo>ℓ</mo><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 B l, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>B</mi><mo>ℓ</mo></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 B l squared, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>B</mi><msup><mo>ℓ</mo><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 B l squared, and denominator t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>B</mi><msup><mo>ℓ</mo><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi>t</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
